ValidationRule.description: BO-1581: AEs should not be able to use "Omit" in Forecast Level field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales" ), ISCHANGED( Forecast_Level__c ), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Level__c, "Omit") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Omit cannot be used for Forecast Level. Please select other option.
